00004 %> @brief Two dimensional sum of phantoms (permittivity distributions) in field of view.

00028    methods (Access=public)
00029        % ==================================================================
00030        %> @brief Class constructor.
00031        %>
00032        %> @param varargin{1} sensor_element object represent field of view
00033        %> 
00034        %> @return instance of the Permittivity_distribution_2D class.
00035        % ==================================================================
00036        function pd_obj=Permittivity_distribution_2D(varargin)
00037            if nargin == 0 ; % no input arguments
00038            elseif isa(varargin{1},'Permittivity_distribution_2D')
00039             pd_obj = varargin{1}; % copy constructor
00040             display 'copy constructor Permittivity_distribution_2D'
00041             return; 
00042            else
00043                switch(nargin)
00044                    case 1;
00045                        display 'creating permittivity distribution '
00046                        if isa(varargin{1},'Sensor_element_circular') %FOV object
00047                            fov=varargin{1};
00048                            pd_obj.fov_indicies_vector=fov.point_list;                           
00049                            pd_obj.fov_size=fov.rmax*2;
00050                                                       
00051                            pd_obj.number_of_phantoms=1;
00052                            pd_obj.phantom_vector=repmat(Phantom_generator_2D,1,1);
00053                            % background is taken from FOV grid
00054                            pd_obj.Discretization_grid_perm=Discretization_grid_2D_square(fov.discretization_grid_of_element.matrix_size_mm,fov.discretization_grid_of_element.grid_size_mm);                            pd_obj.Discretization_grid_perm.value_list=fov.discretization_grid_of_element.value_list;
00055                        
00056                            pd_obj.fov_eps_vector_full_discretization_grid=pd_obj.Discretization_grid_perm.value_list;
00057                        end
00058                 otherwise
00059                        error('too less or too many input arguments');
00060                end     
00061            end
00062        end
00063        
00064        % ==================================================================
00065        %> @brief Use to add Phantom_generator_2D object to field of view. 
00066        %>
00067        %> @param ph_object Phantom_generator_2D object
00068        % ==================================================================
00069        function add_Element(pd_obj,ph_object)
00070            % last element is on top
00071            
00072            % we can add element using Phantom_generator
00073            % discretization grid must be the same as other elements have
00074            % e.g. sensor
00075            % We use points which only belongs to FOV
00076            
00077            if isa(ph_object,'Phantom_generator_2D')                     
00078                
00079                pd_obj.phantom_vector(pd_obj.number_of_phantoms)=ph_object;
00080                pd_obj.number_of_phantoms=pd_obj.number_of_phantoms+1;
00081                
00082                % check all point from phantom 
00083                for i=1:length(ph_object.point_list)
00084                    ph_index=ph_object.point_list(i);
00085                    
00086                    % is point in FOV vector?
00087                    empty=isempty(find(pd_obj.fov_indicies_vector==ph_index,1));                   
00088                    if(~empty)                       
00089                        new_val=ph_object.discretization_grid.value_list(ph_index);
00090                        pd_obj.Discretization_grid_perm.value_list(ph_index)=new_val;
00091                    end
00092                    pd_obj.max_perm_value=max(pd_obj.Discretization_grid_perm.value_list);
00093                end                                  
00094               
00095            else
00096               
00097             end
00098        end
00099        
00100        % ==================================================================
00101        %> @brief GetFOV returns FOV part of given image using sensor data
00102        %> structure. This function require image processing toolbox.
00103        %>
00104        %> @param image_matrix_size rescale side size [pix]
00105        %> @param rescale flag if rescale to reconsruction matrix size have to be done
00106        %> 0 no, 1 yes (default value is 1)
00107        %> @param threshold 0-without, other value - use it
00108        %> @param method interpolating method for image rescaling (default is bilinear).
00109        %> For more see imresize help.
00110        %>
00111        %> @retval out return value of this method
00112        % ==================================================================
00113        function [fovImg] = getFOV(pd_obj,image_matrix_size, rescale,threshold, method)
00114         sFOV  = pd_obj.fov_size;             % fov size                    (pix)
00115         sMtxS = pd_obj.Discretization_grid_perm.number_of_x_axis_pixel;  % simulation matrix size      (pix)
00116         sMtxR = image_matrix_size;    % reconstruction matrix size  (pix)
00117 
00118         simulation_phantom_matrix = pd_obj.Discretization_grid_perm.get_matrix();
00119         
00120     
00121         % we assume that fov is centered on image
00122         % and image matrix have the same size as simulation matrix
00123         [sx sy]=size(simulation_phantom_matrix);
00124         if(sx~=sMtxS || sy~=sMtxS),
00125             fovImg = [];
00126             display('ERR: Image and simulation matrix size are different.');
00127             return;
00128         end
00129 
00130         margin=round((sMtxS-sFOV)/2);
00131         
00132         fovImg=simulation_phantom_matrix(margin+(1:1:sFOV),margin+(1:1:sFOV));
00133 
00134 
00135         if(nargin<3),
00136             rescale=1;
00137         end;
00138         if(nargin<4),
00139             method='bilinear';
00140         end;
00141         if(rescale==1),
00142             fovImg=imresize(fovImg,[sMtxR,sMtxR],method,'Antialiasing',1);            
00143             if(threshold~=0)
00144                 indmin=find(fovImg<threshold);
00145                 [r,c]=size(indmin);                
00146                 indmin=reshape(indmin,1,r);
00147                 
00148                 indmax=find(fovImg>=threshold);
00149                 [r,c]=size(indmax);            
00150                 indmax=reshape(indmax,1,r);
00151                 
00152                 % maximum value in each columns
00153                 m_val=max(fovImg);
00154                 % maximum value in vector
00155                 m_val=max(m_val);
00156                 
00157                 n_x=numel(indmax);
00158                 n_m=numel(indmin);
00159                 
00160                 tmp=ones(1,n_x);
00161                 size(tmp);
00162                 tmp=tmp.*m_val;
00163                 fovImg(indmax)=tmp;
00164                 
00165                 tmp2=zeros(1,n_m);
00166                 fovImg(indmin)=tmp2;
00167             end
00168         end;
00169 
00170         return;       
00171        end
00172        %end get resize permittivity
00173     end 
00174 end
